title: I Don't Like Wearing Panties
itunes:title: I Don't Like Wearing Panties
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I truly embarrassed myself and I want to pack up and move out of town. I live alone in a quaint little area of town and I am the only black resident on the street. My neighbors and I sit on our front porches in the evening and laugh and talk to each other to pass the time. The other evening, as I was sitting on my porch, I noticed that my azaleas were blooming, so I decided to pull the weeds and put out some plant food for them................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I truly embarrassed myself and I want to pack up and move out of town. I live alone in a quaint little area of town and I am the only black resident on the street. My neighbors and I sit on our front porches in the evening and laugh and talk to each other to pass the time. The other evening, as I was sitting on my porch, I noticed that my azaleas were blooming, so I decided to pull the weeds and put out some plant food for them................
